button.pay.description: Button text used to pay for the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text used to continue paying for the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text used to view order details.

button.query.description: Button text used to query the order.

button.finish.description: Button text used to manually complete the order.

button.update.description: Button text used to update the order.

field.amount.description: The points amount of the order.

field.price.description: The points amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service used for transmitting data via HTTP.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to proceed with payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message indicating the order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan the QR code to complete payment.
message.wechatPayHelp.description: Message providing help for WeChat payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete payment at the external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message indicating payment via external link.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: Message indicating the update was successful.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to a paid status and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. Please confirm the customer has completed the payment, do you wish to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating it is still awaiting user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating it has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating it has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating it has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating payment has failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating Alipay payment, which is an online payment method.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website, indicating Stripe payment, which is an online payment method.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website, indicating order management.
